isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500, 8600 Models Built Before 05/20/2003 - TRANSMISSIONS - EATON® LIGHTNING™ TRANSMISSION

svcsubsecinfo.para: Discussion of the EATON LIGHTNING transmission In this section is limited to the transmission ECU power circuits, power circuits to the shift Lightning ECM and drive train 1939 data link connectivity. For detailed information on transmission diagnostics, refer to the appropriate EATON service manual.

svcproc.title: CIRCUIT FUNCTIONS
svcproc.para: The lightning transmission interfaces with the vehicle electrical system via the Eaton Lightning ECM, the shift control lever, back up light switch and the engine ECU.

The transmission communicates on the drivetrain 1939 data link to interface with the engine controller, electrical system controller and the air ABS controller. The drivetrain 1939 data link is connected to the shift control in the cab.
